Package com.example.onestopshop

package com.example.onestopshop
  • Class
    Description
    AddItemActivity
    Activity for managing fragments to add a new item to the inventory.
    AddItemFragment
    Fragment to add an item to the inventory
    BarcodeActivity
    Activity for scanning and adding barcodes to the inventory.
    CustomList
    CustomList is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of items in the inventory.
    EditGalleryActivity
    Activity for editing the gallery of photos associated with an item.
    EditItemActivity
    EditItemActivity allows the user to edit details of an existing item in the inventory.
    FilterActivity
    FilterActivity allows the user to filter items based on various criteria such as make, date, and tags.
    GalleryFragment
    GalleryFragment is a Fragment that allows the user to view and manage photos associated with an item.
    InventoryActivity
    InventoryActivity represents the main activity for managing and displaying the inventory of items.
    InventoryController
    InventoryController manages interactions with the Firebase Firestore database for inventory-related data.
    InventoryController.ItemAddedCallback
     
    InventoryController.OnInventorySearchListener
     
    InventoryController.OnInventoryUpdateListener
    Interface for receiving inventory data update events.
    InventoryController.OnItemFetchListener
    Interface for fetching details of a specific item.
    Item
    This is a class that represents an item and its details
    ItemPhoto
    Represents a photo associated with an item, containing a photo URL and an optional photo ID.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity handles user authentication via Google Sign-In.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity serves as the entry point of the application, handling user authentication and navigation to InventoryActivity.
    MultipleTagsDialog
    This is a dialog for adding tags to multiple items
    PhotoAdapter
    Adapter class for binding ItemPhoto data to RecyclerView.
    PhotosController
    Controller class for managing photos related operations, including upload, download, and deletion.
    PhotosController.DownloadUrlCallback
    Interface for handling success or failure of the download URL retrieval.
    PhotosController.OnPhotoListUpdateListener
    Interface for handling updates to the photo list.
    ScanActivity
    ScanActivity allows the user to capture or choose an image and extracts a serial number using ML Kit Text Recognition.
    SearchActivity
    Activity for searching items in the inventory by keywords
    TagDialog
    Custom dialog for managing tags using chips.
    TagsController
    Class for TagsController that fetches tags from firestore
    TagsController.OnTagsFetchListener
    The interface to listen for tag fetch operations.
    UserProfileActivity
    UserProfileActivity displays user profile information and allows users to log out.
    ViewItemActivity
    Activity for viewing the details of a specific item.
